summary: A small retexture of the white stag.
descriptionHtml:
Frankly, I didn\'t think the White Stag quite lived up to his name. This retexture cleans up his markings and lightens his coat to a pure, uniform white. In the sunlight he tends to \"glow\" since he\'s so light-colored, but I thought it went well with him being a unique, somewhat magical sort of creature.

The screenshots don\'t do him justice--to see him in-game, use the console command \"player.placeatme 00104F46\", or do the quest Ill Met By Moonlight in Falkreath. :)

To uninstall, simply delete the texture and he should revert back to his vanilla texture.
author: The13thBlackCat
